segments.text: ğŸ‘‹ Hello and welcome!
In this video I will share with you delicious and the easiest lentil recipe! ğŸ‘ ğŸ’–
Rinse 1 cup red lentils (7oz | 200g) with water and drain.
Watch the video to learn how to cook lentils in a new incredibly delicious way!
Place in to a blender bowl.
3 cups boiling water (24fl oz | 700ml).
This is a very easy recipe everyone can make at home. Just follow my step by step instructions.
Soak for 30 minutes.
ğŸˆ Warmest greetings from Lancy! ğŸ˜½ ğŸ’–
1/2tsp salt (optional).
Blend until smooth.
Add the mixture to a medium size saucepan.
Cook over medium heat, whisk constantly.
When it starts to thicken or bubble turn down to medium-low or low heat.
Keep stirring for a total of 7-10 minutes until mixture is very thick.
Once it is very thick remove from heat.
â„¹ï¸ Work quickly, it will start to set almost right away.
Smooth top over with a spatula.

Let the mixture set at the room temperature for 1 hour.
Then chill in the fridge overnight.
Invert onto a cutting board.
Cut into desired shape and sizes you prefer.
You can cut into cubes and cook like you would normal tofu!
The texture is really similar to regular tofu and it has a delicious flavor.
Place lentil tofu slices in to an air fryer basket.
Drizzle with oil.
Air fry at 400F | 200C  for 15 minutes (Flip over half way).
You can add marinade/sauce to the cubes or season with spices, whatever you want. I
I like it with soy sauce or coconut aminos.
Thank you so much for watching my video and see you again soon! ğŸ’š ğŸ˜Š ğŸ’–

fullText:
ğŸ‘‹ Hello and welcome!  In this video I will share with you delicious and the easiest lentil recipe! ğŸ‘ ğŸ’– Rinse 1 cup red lentils (7oz | 200g) with water and drain. Watch the video to learn how to cook lentils in a new incredibly delicious way!  Place in to a blender bowl. 3 cups boiling water (24fl oz | 700ml). This is a very easy recipe everyone can make at home. Just follow my step by step instructions. Soak for 30 minutes. ğŸˆ Warmest greetings from Lancy! ğŸ˜½ ğŸ’–  1/2tsp salt (optional). Blend until smooth. Add the mixture to a medium size saucepan. Cook over medium heat, whisk constantly. When it starts to thicken or bubble turn down to medium-low or low heat. Keep stirring for a total of 7-10 minutes until mixture is very thick. Once it is very thick remove from heat. â„¹ï¸ Work quickly, it will start to set almost right away. Smooth top over with a spatula. Let the mixture set at the room temperature for 1 hour.
Then chill in the fridge overnight. Invert onto a cutting board. Cut into desired shape and sizes you prefer. You can cut into cubes and cook like you would normal tofu!  The texture is really similar to regular tofu and it has a delicious flavor. Place lentil tofu slices in to an air fryer basket. Drizzle with oil. Air fry at 400F | 200C  for 15 minutes (Flip over half way). You can add marinade/sauce to the cubes or season with spices, whatever you want. I I like it with soy sauce or coconut aminos.   
Thank you so much for watching my video and see you again soon! ğŸ’š ğŸ˜Š ğŸ’–
